title: The Lies That Bind
description: Book restoration expert Brooklyn Wainwright returns home to San Francisco to teach a bookbinding class. Unfortunately, the program director Layla Fontaine is a horrendous host who pitches fits and lords over her subordinates. But when Layla is found shot dead, Brooklyn is bound and determined to investigateâ€”even as the killer tries to close the book on her for good.
author: Kate Carlisle
